description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget screen called 'ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen' for a delivery/restaurant management app. The screen serves as a stub or placeholder for managing locations and time slots, including a header widget and several placeholder rows.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that provides the main scaffold for managing locations and time slots, including a header and list of placeholder items.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that displays a styled header section with a gradient background and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget representing each placeholder row containing an icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the 'ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen'.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the '_SectionHeader' widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the '_Row' widget.
